commit.message:
float-i386.h (LDBL_EPSILON): Remove __convert_long_double machinery.


2000-08-22 Steven King <sxking@uswest.net>

	* config/float-i386.h (LDBL_EPSILON): Remove __convert_long_double
	machinery.
	(LDBL_MAX): Same here.

From-SVN: r35883

+	* config/float-i386.h (LDBL_EPSILON): Remove __convert_long_double
+	machinery.
+	(LDBL_MAX): Same here.
